mapper.select: WITH STUDENTVIEW AS ( SELECT dt_nm,st_nm,st_cd from student s inner join department d on (s.dt_cd = d.dt_cd) ) SELECT st_nm , dt_nm , es_cd , es.exam_cd , es.lec_cd , es.st_cd , es_date , es_score , exam_score FROM exam_submit es inner join STUDENTVIEW s on s.st_cd = es.st_cd inner join exam e on e.exam_cd = es.exam_cd WHERE es.exam_cd = #{examCd}

WITH EXAM_SUBMIT_VIEW AS ( SELECT eq_cd,st_cd,eqs_score,eqs_answer,es.es_cd ,es_score from EXAM_SUBMIT es inner join EXAM_QUEST_SUBMIT eqs on (es.es_cd = eqs.es_cd) where es.exam_cd = #{examCd} ) SELECT eq.eq_cd , eq.exam_cd , eq_type , eq_qt , eq_answ , eq_score , eq_num , eq_view1 , eq_view2 , eq_view3 , eq_view4 , eqs_score , eqs_answer , st_cd , es_cd , es_score FROM exam_question eq inner join EXAM_SUBMIT_VIEW esv on eq.eq_cd = esv.eq_cd where eq.exam_cd = #{examCd} and st_cd = #{stCd}
SELECT es_cd , eq_cd , eqs_answer , eqs_score FROM exam_quest_submit where es_cd = #{esCd}
